column4: Does anyone know how I can run the Synaptic Package Manager in XCFE4? I tried running "sudo synaptic" from the console, and also added a launcher to my panel. neither works.
what errors do you get?
i get GTK errors when running from the console, and nothing when clicking the launcher
what does it say?
can I paste it in a message to you?
how long is it?
~15 lines
join #flood and send it to me there
pasted
ok, can you run synaptic in gnome?
yes, runs fine in gnome
odd
hmm
try running X without any desktop environment/window managers and see if it still doesn't work
to see if it's a problem with xfce or with gtk
how do I go about that?
you have to modify .xinitrc in your home directory and 'startx' manually
first, you have to shut down gdm
you should probably post your problem over at ubuntuforums.com
I have to go now, hope you get your problem fixed
will do, thanks
